author: John Hodgen
text: He’s hallelujah. He’s glory hole. The world has more women than he can shake a stick
at. The world is his brickbat, no conscience to prick at, all of us Germans he can
He’s got his own anchor. He’s whack-a-doodle. King Canoodle. He’s a pirate, Long John
Silver, walking his own plank. He has science to thank. He’s in like Flynn. He’s Gunga Din,
He’s a god now, the talk of the town. He’s got no place to go but down.
title: For the Man with the Erection Lasting More than Four Hours
